title: Mentoring Model-Based Professional Development Program for New Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Science Education Experience and Basic Mentoring Competencies
context.additional_context: Mentoring competency enhancement program for novice science teachers, offering personalized learning experiences in a BYOD environment; verifies real-world applicability through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Mentors can assess novice teachers' instructional design competencies using a three-stage (knowledge-analysis-application) mentoring framework based on an educational model.
Learners can collaboratively produce two case analysis reports reflecting the complexity of science education settings through cooperative activities with peer mentors.
Participants can submit a digital portfolio that completes the "knowledge-practice-reflection" cycle by documenting their mentoring practices as action research.

resources: Mentoring Case Video Library within LMS

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
